statements: SELECT * FROM customer_sales_history
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_amount FROM customer_sales_history
SELECT product_id, purchase_date FROM customer_sales_history WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT * FROM customer_sales_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM customer_sales_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_sales_history WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customer_sales_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM customer_sales_history GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT product_id, AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount FROM customer_sales_history GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM customer_sales_history WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, sale_amount FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '7%' OR phone_number LIKE '8%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND total_amount > 100.00;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE c.customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT report_date, total_sales FROM SalesReport WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Order INNER JOIN Product ON Order.product_id = Product.product_id WHERE Order.quantity > 10 ORDER BY Order.order_date DESC;

SELECT Customer.name, SUM(Order.quantity * Product.price) AS total_amount FROM Customer INNER JOIN Order ON Customer.customer_id = Order.customer_id INNER JOIN Product ON Order.product_id = Product.product_id GROUP BY Customer.name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT Customer.name, SUM(SalesReport.total_sales) AS total_sales FROM Customer INNER JOIN SalesReport ON Customer.customer_id = SalesReport.customer_id GROUP BY Customer.name HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, total_sales FROM sales_reports WHERE total_sales > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, customer_id, total_sales FROM sales_reports WHERE total_sales > 1000;
